1.3 Estimated amount of emission reductions over the crediting
period including project size:
Total Estimated Emission reductions are 177,570 tCO e over the ten year crediting period. As per the VCS 2
2007.1 standard guidelines, project size falls under category Projects.
Table 1: Estimated amount of emission reductions over the chosen crediting period

[['Total number of Crediting years', '10'], ['Annual average over the crediting period of\nestimated reductions (tonnes of CO e)\n2', '17757']]
VCS Project Description
PP Savita Oil Technologies Ltd. has applied for registration under the CDM process of UNFCCC and the
project activity has received Host Country Approval. A letter of undertaking from the Project Proponent
has been provided to validator, in which PP has declared that GHG reduction credit would be claim up to
the date of Registration of project activity in CDM. There would be no double counting of GHG credits, in
line with the VCS 2007.1 standard and “Further Guidance for projects that are registered in two GHG
Programs” dated 19 March 2008 issued by VCS Association.
